summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) form used to document warnings and assurances given to a voluntary interviewee. It indicates an OIG investigation is being conducted, but the specific subject of the investigation is redacted. The form includes a waiver for the employee to sign, acknowledging the voluntary nature of the interview.
keyFacts: The document is a Department of Justice OIG form for voluntary employee interviews.
It confirms an OIG investigation is being conducted, but the specific subject is redacted.
The form outlines that the interview is voluntary and no disciplinary action will be taken for refusing to answer.
Statements provided may be used in future criminal or disciplinary proceedings.
The form includes a waiver section for the employee to sign, acknowledging the warnings.
